property.description: Very nice home on a one block dead end street with woods nearby. Very special location for quiet and privacy! Home features open floor plan with large rooms - new patio doors to pretty yard. updates: shingles, vinyl siding, refrig and dishwasher, garage door. Fireplace in family room flanked by great built-ins. add first floor laundry and award winning Padua schools.

Surround fireplace. Quality thru-out! Call lister for completion date. Wow! Expect to be impressed with this new 4-bdrm transitional home! All the upgrades for the distinguished buyer. Quality thru-out! Call lister for completion date.

Close to Padua and Argyle with 1.67 acres of breathing space. Wood floors throughout, tile entry, 6 panel doors, 2 car garage and a home warranty so you can buy with confidence!

Walkin closets.2 stairways to partially finished basement with lots of storage/expansion area. Nicely decorated and landscaped. Master bath with whirlpool! Fireplace in sunken family room. Huge kitchen with island and desk. Nice! Call seller direct and save!
